content: I'd like to invite you to my planet.

content: Yeee~? H-Hiya! <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>. I'm so happy to get your call.

content: Aw, thanks for the invite~! I'm looking for seeds on an Islet not too far away. Just wait a bit, I'll be there right over.
info: NPC星湾打电话邀请来访-1010云果_1010-云果

content: Really mah~? I'm out on an islet close by, diggin' a bit, and I was thinkin' I might come see ya. Please wait, I'll be right there.
info: NPC星湾打电话邀请来访-1010云果_1010-云果
